benchmark_details.name: CR-LT-KGQA (Commonsense Reasoning and Long-Tail Knowledge Question Answering)
benchmark_details.overview: CR-LT-KGQA is a novel Knowledge Graph Question Answering dataset that requires commonsense reasoning and focuses on long-tail entities, posing significant challenges for hallucination-prone large language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a challenging KGQA dataset that requires commonsense reasoning and targets long-tail knowledge.

data.annotation: Annotated by experts through a manual verification process.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of LLMs in answering queries and verifying claims.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in terms of correctness and reasoning reliability.
methodology.baseline_results: Evaluation on existing LLMs shows significant performance drops in long-tail settings.
methodology.validation: Baseline evaluations were established using GPT-3.5 Turbo with both zero-shot and few-shot settings.
